knimeNode.name: Conformal Prediction Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Splits the input table into three new tables: training, calibration/cross-validation and test.

fullDescription.intro: Splits the input table into three new tables: training, calibration/cross-validation and test. First goes training and test split, then the rest of the training table is split into training and calibration/cross-validation. The last procedure is repeated several times for every loop iteration. Test set is created only once and always remains the same during all iterations.
fullDescription.option: Defines the number of training/calibration splits and number of loop iterations.
Similar to Partitioning node splits input table into two datasets. This split is done once for all loop iterations.
Similar to Partitioning node splits training set into two datasets - training and calibration. This split is done for every loop iteration.
